name: variants.world
description:
A service that allows users to chess.com to propose and discuss new chess variants.
Стек: `AstroJS`, `Preact`, `Prisma` + `Supabase`, `PostgreSQL`, `Tailwind`.
Responsibilities: full development and implementation, database design, unit testing.

name: ostis-deploy
description:
A platform on which university students of our specialty could host their knowledge bases and have convenient access to them.
Стек: `Deno`, `Fresh`, `Docker`, `GitHub App`, `Tailwind`.
Responsibilities: development and implementation of the functionality, github auth implementation, ui/ux.

name: pie-tunes
description:
A course project in which a streaming service was developed with a recommendation system based on a graph knowledge base.
Стек: `Spring Boot` (Security, Web), `MinIO`, `Preact`, `Redux`, `Gradle`, `Docker`.
Responsibilities: architecture designe, implementation of REST services, knowledgebase design, ui/ux.

name: http-server
description:
A simple implementation of an http server using Java NIO, allowing you to create simple web applications.
Стек: `Java`.
Responsibilities: full development and implementation.

name: dnd-lists
description:
An application that allows you to create/edit character sheets for the game Dungeons & Dragons.
Стек: `Spring Boot` (Security, Web, Data JPA), `PostgreSQL`, `TypeScript`, `Preat`, `Redux`, `Bootstrap`.
Responsibilities: interface development and implementation, implementation of REST service.
